page.title: 07ALLOTMENT GARDENING,SEAHAM
page.content: ALLOTMENTS ARE SMALL ENCLOSED PLOTS OF LAND WHICH ARE USED BY PEOPLE EITHER TO GROW THINGS OR KEEP ANIMALS.THE FENCING FOR THESE ENCLOSURES IS USUALLY RAMSHACKLE AND OPPORTUNIST , SUCH ITEMS AS OLD DOORS,OLD FENCING, WOOD,METAL SHEETING OR PLASTIC SHEETING BEING USED.PEOPLE USUALLY GROW VEGETABLES IN THEIR ALLOTMENTS, GROWING ENOUGH FOR THEIR FAMILY AND FREINDS WITH POSSIBLY A LITTLE EXTRA TO SELL.THIS HELPS TO PAY FOR SEEDS AND GREENHOUSE HEATING.SOME PEOPLE USE AN ALLOTMENT TO KEEP ANIMALS SUCH AS HORSES,GOATS OR DOGS.PIGEONS ARE A FAVOURITE PASTIME.SOME PEOPLE ENTER THEIR PIGEONS INTO RACES,THE PIGEONS SOMETIMES STARTING FROM ANOTHER COUNTRY.THE WINNERS ARE THE FIRST BIRDS BACK TO THEIR "CREE" BACK IN THE ALLOTMENT.FLOWERS AND VEGETABLES ARE OFTEN ENTERED IN LOCAL COMPETITIONS.
